questions.question: Why does the author compare Bud to Brer Rabbit?

choices.answer: Bud is wimpy, just like Brer Rabbit.
The author just wanted to have fun
Bud is very intelligent, just like Brer Rabbit

"I'm one of the best liars in the world, but Todd was pretty doggone good"

"Todd hadn't quit lying since the second I came to his house" (16).

questions.question: How does Bud lying to the Amoses when he apologize teach readers about Bud?

choices.answer: Bud is comfortable with lying and has done it often throughout his life
Bud lies to get out of doing stuff he doesn't like because he is lazy

questions.question: What does the author want readers to understand about Bud by including his "Rules and Things"?

choices.answer: He likes to learn from his mistakes and successes.
He uses the Rules and Things to navigate difficult situations
